767890.name: Hello Neighbor's Favorite Songs
767890.description:
"Neighbor's favorite songs" features 11 original songs by Rockit Gaming. You get both .mp3 and .wavs! Each track is at least 3 minutes long, and has been mastered specifically for this OST. Your songs will download into the HelloNeighborOST directory, next to the main game.

1 - Alone With You
2 - Get You Gone
3 - Stir the Truth
4 - Afraid of the Dark
5 - Die Another Day
6 - Hey Neighbor
7 - Watch Your Back
8 - The Neighbor Knows
9 - Alone With You (DJ Trickshot Remix)
10 - Get You Gone (DJ Trickshot Remix)
11 Get You Gone (ft Julie Neff)
767890.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
